name: Wildmud Wardens
description:
Join Hayətawa in her journey to avenge her fallen people from the supernatural vermin that caused a catastrophic earthquake that destroyed her homeland!

With the aid of a powerful orb and a trusty orb, aim and shoot with accuracy to your enemies! Your goal is to finish them all to demonstrate that you can defeat the lords of the earth!

NOTE: This is only a prototype, may contain bugs and development may stay in hold for an unknown number of years.

!) Keyboard and mouse inputs are not fully implemented yet but can be played with controller without problems.
